description:
A lighter version of Osprey's tricked-out hydration reservoir. It has welded Chevron baffles to minimize sloshing and maintain a flat profile. It's designed for easy filling (even from a shallow pool or creek) and you can pour water with control rather than dumping it on your shoes.

  • Made of taste-free TPU film that contains no BPA, can be frozen and is safe to use with hot water (up to 140F/60C)
  • Radio frequency welded seams offer a consistent air-tight seal that won't leak
  • Twin welded chevron baffles minimize sloshing and give the reservoir a flat profile in your pack
  • Slide Seal wide opening is easy to clean and dry. Dishwasher safe, on the top rack only
  • Pour shield extends the collar for filling in shallow sinks and streams and add control when pouring into pots or bottles.
  • Integrated handle to pull it out of your pack
  • Flexible TPU hose resists kinks and can be routed to either side of the reservoir
  • QuickConnect tube system lets you remove the reservoir from your pack while leaving the hose in place
  • HydraPak Blaster bite valve has an on/off switch to prevent dribbles. Magnetic clip attaches to the hose and pairs with the included sternum strap magnet
name: Osprey Hydraulics LT Reservoir
